title: The Pie Delivery
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Pizza, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Pizzeria with locations in SLC. Takeout or delivery only; no dine-in. Offers vegan cheese and vegan-possible choices and are marked with a green leaf icon. Or you could ask for the vegan menu. Has pizza by the slice during the day which can be made vegan as well. Stop taking delivery orders 20 minutes before closing.
